name: YTTracker
author: Thomas Couchoud <zerderr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/MrCraftCod/)
description: This extension will track your time on YouTube

scripts.chromeManifest: cd chrome && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.chromeManifestBeta: cd chrome && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.chromePackage: npm run chromeIncludes && cd chrome && zip -r chromeExtension.zip ./* -x "*.DS_Store" && cd ../ && mv chrome/chromeExtension.zip chromeExtension.zip
scripts.chromeBuild: npm run chromeManifest && npm run chromePackage
scripts.chromeBuildBeta: npm run chromeManifestBeta && npm run chromePackage
scripts.chromeRelease: npm run chromeBuild && npm run chromeSend && npm run chromeClear && npm run chromeReleaseBeta
scripts.chromeReleaseBeta: npm run chromeBuildBeta && npm run chromeSendBeta
scripts.firefoxManifest: cd firefox && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.firefoxManifestBeta: cd firefox && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.firefoxPackage: npm run firefoxIncludes && cd firefox && zip -r firefoxExtension.xpi ./* -x "*.DS_Store" && cd ../ && mv firefox/firefoxExtension.xpi firefoxExtension.xpi
scripts.firefoxBuild: npm run firefoxManifest && npm run firefoxPackage
scripts.firefoxBuildBeta: npm run firefoxManifestBeta && npm run firefoxPackage
